content: Graduate Assistant/Associate (GA) benefits are administered by the Graduate College. Eligible GAs receive tuition reduction based on FTE, enrollment, and appointment dates, and the University covers the single-student Campus Health insurance premium during the appointment. Fees (program/differential/other) are not covered.
GAs can enroll in the GA Deferment Plan to delay payment of any remaining tuition/fees; enrollment must occur the business day before classes start to avoid late charges.

If GA benefits have not posted: complete all appointment requirements; deduct expected GA benefits from the current balance and pay the remainder by the Tuition Payment Deadline; the Graduate College may place a Pending Grad Award (GPA) indicator to prevent late charges.
Primary contact is the appointing department; if unavailable, email gahelp@grad.arizona.edu. For policy details, see the Graduate Assistant/Associate Manual.
